actions.text: On agreeing to the Levin (MI) amendment (A004) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 236 - 152 (Roll no. 225).
The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A004) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Levin (MI) amendment (A004) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 236 - 152 (Roll no. 225).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Levin (MI).
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Levin (MI) amendment (A004) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 236 - 152 (Roll no. 225).

description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 116-593 to establish that any eligible entity applying for a title II grant should be partnering with a labor or joint labor-management organization, to the extent practicable.
purpose: Amendment establishes that any eligible entity applying for a title II grant should be partnering with a labor or joint labor-management organization, to the extent practicable.
